msbt.message: M-M-MONSTER!Huh? Now hang on, if I squint and stareand stare Oh yeah, that's just you, .Don't scare an old man like that! Now, if I had to guess, you went and stuck your head in a wasp nest.It's alright, we've allllll been there.Well go on, get some medicine on that. It'll fix you right up.
Now THAT'S a face! Those pesky wasps get you, did they? Gahaha! You're lucky they didn't do worse.Go get some medicine on that and you'll feel much better.

YEOW! Are you alright? That face of yours just about stopped my ticker!I know you can be a little clumsy, so tell me Was it wasps? 'Cause it looks like it musta been wasps.Well, hurry up and take some medicine. You'll feel better quick!

Is your face alright? 'Cause that sure looks like it must smart. You gotta be careful around them sneaky wasps!Here, take a dash of this medicine. It'll clear that right up. Unlessis swollen face in style these days?
Well, I hope you learned something from all this. Try not to let it happen again.
YEOW! Are you alright? That face of yours just about stopped my ticker!I know you can be a little clumsy, so tell me Was it wasps? 'Cause it looks like it musta been wasps.
Well, you know what? I happen to have just the thing for that here.
It's a recipe for some medicine! You can whip it up quick with stuff you'd find around the island. It'd be a good idea to memorize the secret recipe, .
